posts.title: Dirt Cologne
posts.content: People say you are “down to earth”, so why not smell like earth too with Dirt cologne. Dirt cologne is scented with warm, dark, and earthy tones. That means it smells like dirt, and that you will too once you spritz yourself and walk through the mist.

posts.title: Left 4 Dead Boomer Figurine
posts.content: Drop off the frighteningly realistic Left 4 Dead Boomer figurine in your home and watch as he infects the Barbies and G.I. Joes. The Boomer figurine is seven inches tall and as full of rage as ever; his guts burble and are detachable, and his belly hangs out gloriously.

posts.title: League Of Regrettable Superheroes
posts.content: Get to know the stranger and lesser known heroes of the comic book world in detail by going through the pages of the League Of Regrettable Superheroes. It comes chock-full of illustrations of heroes like “Bee-Man” and “The Eye” along with their full backstories.

posts.title: Manly Diaper Bag
posts.content: With the manly diaper bag at your disposal, you can take care of your your baby while on the go without losing any man points. This masculine diaper bad looks just like a tool belt and features a multitude of conveniently placed pockets to assist you with your little rugrat.

posts.title: Global Swear Words Coloring Book
posts.content: Expand your already colorful vocabulary even further using this international swear words coloring book. This creative language building tool comes with 50 magnificent illustrations that each display a different country’s way of saying “Fuck You”.

posts.title: The Miracle Cube Timer
posts.content: Setting a timer has never been quicker and easier than with the Miracle Cube timer. To set, you simply flip the cube to the desired time interval and the countdown begins – making it ideal for use in the kitchen or during game nights.

posts.title: Pool Couch
posts.content: If you’re going to bum it out on a couch all day, you might as well get a tan in the process. The pool couch is an inflatable water float that easily fits two people and their drink of choice in the built in arm rest cup holders, and makes a great gift to relax on the water.

posts.title: The Treadmill Desk
posts.content: Increase your level of physical activity during the workday using this treadmill desk. The desk can adjust to accommodate any height while the treadmill can support up to 250 pounds and be set at speeds ranging from 0.5 to 2 mph.

posts.title: World Map Shower Curtain
posts.content: Make the most of your morning shower by brushing up on some global geography with the world map shower curtain. Even if you choose to ignore the educational value altogether, the vibrant colors of the map make for a great way to liven up your bathroom’s decor.

posts.title: Planetary Paperweight
posts.content: Keep the unruly pile of papers at your desk organized by thrusting the weight of the universe onto it with the planetary paperweight. This compact paperweight will keep documents stationary while providing you with a stunning view of our solar system.

posts.title: Glow In The Dark Body Paint
posts.content: Go from plain Jane to queen of Burning Man by making yourself over with this glow in the dark body paint. This non-toxic washable paint goes on easy, comes in 7 outrageous neon colors and emits a brilliant glow under UV lighting.

posts.title: LED Emergency Road Flares
posts.content: Setting up a secure perimeter is safer and more convenient than ever thanks to these LED emergency road flares. The set includes 3 heavy duty shatterproof, crushproof, and weatherproof flares that offer 9 different flashing modes so you’re prepared for any situation.
